授業目的:
The main objective is to improve students' ability to discuss educational issues in English.
The secondary objective is to improve their active vocabulary.
到達目標:
By the end of the course, students should be able to discuss, give their opinions on and present on the issues raised in
the course.
特記事項: 本授業科目は、“オンライン授業60単位制限対象科目”ではありません。 The course is not subject to the 60-credit limit for online courses.
授業方法: Class will normally begin with warmup questions about recent events and the weather. There will be ample opportunity for pair and group work.

第1回: Introductions; First Semester - Discussion Questions (two rounds) ; instructor's schedule; Ontario teen seeks apology after board cancels visit from drag performers - model read.
Review. Ontario teen - read & look up vocabulary.
第2回: First Semester - Discussion Questions (one round). Ontario teen - read aloud & chorus (short segments).
第3回: Ontario teen - read aloud & chorus (short segments). Vocabulary Matching Exercise
第4回:
Ontario teen - read aloud & chorus (long segments). Vocabulary Matching Exercise. Start
Comprehension Questions.
第5回: Ontario teen - students read aloud in turns. Cloze. Comprehension Questions.
第6回: Ontario teen - students read aloud in turns.　Discussion Questions.
第7回: Ontario teen - students read aloud in turns. Cloze.
第8回: Ontario teen - students read aloud in turns. Dictation Practice. Comprehension Questions.
第9回: Ontario teen - students read aloud in turns.  Drag is Never Appropriate for Kids - read aloud & repeat.
第10回: First listening test. Drag is Never Appropriate for Kids - read aloud & repeat.
第11回: Return first listening tests. Drag is Never Appropriate for Kids - read aloud & repeat.
第12回: Drag is Never Appropriate for Kids -  students read aloud in turns. Vocabulary Matching Exercises I & II.
第13回: Drag is Never Appropriate for Kids -  students read aloud in turns. Vocabulary Matching Exercises I & II.
第14回: Drag is Never Appropriate for Kids -  students read aloud in turns. Vocabulary Matching Exercises II,
第15回: Start of Fall Term Discussion Questions - two rounds. Drag is Never Appropriate for Kids -  students read aloud in turns.
第16回: Drag is Never Appropriate for Kids -  students read aloud in turns.  Discussion Questions.
第17回: The 'Infamous 96' Know Firsthand What Happens When Affirmative Action Is Banned - model read.
第18回: The 'Infamous 96'  - read aloud & chorus (short segments). Vocabulary matching exercises I, II & III.
第19回: The 'Infamous 96'  - read aloud & chorus (long segments). Vocabulary matching exercises IV & V.
第20回: The 'Infamous 96- students read aloud in turns. Vocabulary matching exercises I, II, III, IV & V.
第21回: The 'Infamous 96- students read aloud in turns. Comprehension Questions. Cloze.
第22回: The 'Infamous 96- students read aloud in turns.  Cloze.
第23回:
Group presentations - choose groups. The 'Infamous 96- students read aloud in turns. Dictation. 
Discussion Questions.

成績評価Grading0: 評価基準等　Grading Criteria etc.

name: 【250】英会話（特）II　１／Oral English II(For Teacher's License)
